Inspect urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse prepares the necessary tools for the inspection of the urinary catheter.
Inspect urinary catheter.subject: The nurse
Inspect urinary catheter.object: the necessary tools for the inspection

Inspect urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse puts on sterile gloves to maintain a clean environment during the inspection.
Inspect urinary catheter.subject: The nurse

Inspect urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse visually examines the urinary catheter for any signs of blockage or leakage.
Inspect urinary catheter.subject: The nurse

Inspect urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse checks the attachment site for any signs of infection or irritation.
Inspect urinary catheter.subject: The nurse

Inspect urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse documents the findings of the urinary catheter inspection in the patient's medical record.
Inspect urinary catheter.subject: The nurse
Inspect urinary catheter.object: the findings of the urinary catheter inspection
